I dont agree with either of you i dont like country not because it sounds bad, but because the only meaning in the songs are shallow and written for rednecks, they are not insightful and i really think its stupid that people wouldnt aspire to being anything but a hillbilly farmer on a tractor, i respect farmers because they do what makes them happy, i just think that country music listeners would get more out of life if they tried to do something with it.

by the way, acccrazy, those bands you named are just as bad as country, being stylishly angry is silly, aaron carter is just a body, he doesnt write anything and his voice is made better by computers, all those punk-pop bands suck ass, they piss me off more than country artists.

comment_33: Okay everybody now that I've gotten incredibly pissed off.... If you people listened to country music you'd understand how meaningful and insightful it is. I'm listening to a song now called "Kill Myself" by Tim McGraw and its one of the most insightful songs I've ever heard. The song isn't about boo hoo my life sucks so I want to die (emo and punk shit talks about that) but it's about realizing you were wrong and completely changing your life. Listen to country music people. Turn a country station on for a day and I can almost guarantee you you'll hear songs that'll move you to tears and songs that'll have you sayin hell yea that's how I feel. To the person who says people who listen to country music should aspire to be more than hillbillies and farmers you are completely wrong. All I listen to is country music and I will soon be going to college to study social work. People who listen to rap should aspire to be more than murderers, drug dealers, and strippers. People who listen to punk and emo should aspire to be happier. She Thinks My Tractors Sexy is an awesome song. lol Oh and to the person who says She Thinks My Wranglers Sexy... I sang the same thing when I got my Wrangler for my 16th birthday b/c this song was playin while I was sittin in it. Well I said HE thinks my Wranglers sexy.  I love this song.

comment_39:
I understand if you don't favor country music, but it is not meaningless - far from it.
Have you ever heard the song, 'Concrete Angel' by Martina McBride?
It's probably one of the most sad songs I have ever heard; and it damn well has a meaning, thanks.
Most country music is really fun and is a mood-booster, for sure.
I normally listen to Aerosmith, Puddle of Mudd, Nirvana, The Clash, Metallica and many, many, many other rock bands.
But I also like country because it never fails to get one in a better mood. It always puts a smile on my face.

Anyways, about this song:
I think it's really funny and it makes me laugh a lot.
^_^
The meaning is basicly obvious, though.

comment_44: This song isn't meant to be about sex like *some* may claim! It's much more innocent then that! Jim Collins, who also wrote "The Good Stuff", "Then They Do" (Trace Adkins) and funny enough "Big Green Tractor" with David Lee Murphy, has stated the reason for writing it was all in good fun and meant as a novelty song. Put into simpler terms: a joke! Not a dirty joke mind you, but it was wrote by two people who were once farmers in their day. If you think this song is about having sex your mind is in the gutter and you should really rethink your priorities!
